Title: Relates to the renunciation of a beneficiary's interest; and to commencing an action based upon a restitution order, or profits from a crime or funds of a convicted person
Summary: Relates to the renunciation of a beneficiary's interest; relates to commencing an action based upon a restitution order, or profits from a crime or funds of a convicted person.
LawCode: Amd §2-1.11, EPT L; amd §420.10, CP L; amd §§213-b & 5014, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the estates, powers and trusts law, in relation to renunciation of a beneficiary's interest; and to amend the criminal procedure law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to commencing an action based upon a restitution order, or profits from a crime or funds of a convicted person pursuant to article twenty-two of the executive law
